tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fuel_maintenance_data (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  fuel_consumption DECIMAL,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumption (
  vehicle_id INT,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
  fuel_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  consumption_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, consumption_date)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceCosts (
  vehicle_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, maintenance_date)
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    date DATE,
    fuel_consumed FLOAT,
    cost_per_gallon FLOAT,
    total_cost FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    total_cost FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_details (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    fuel_capacity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceCosts (
    maintenance_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    date DATE,
    service_type VARCHAR(50),
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT,
    model VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE BudgetPlanning (
    budget_id INT,
    year INT,
    total_budget DECIMAL(12,2),
    fuel_budget DECIMAL(12,2),
    maintenance_budget DECIMAL(12,2)
);
